document.full_text: robustelli was an all-pro six times and the n.f.l.'s most outstanding player in 1962, helping the giants' defense evoke a celebrity aura.
document.title: andy robustelli, giants' hall of fame defensive end, dies at 85
lines_and_colors: robustelli was an all-pro six times and the n.f.l.'s most outstanding player in 1962, helping the giants' defense evoke a celebrity aura.
